definitions.definition: Working time outside of one's regular hours.
examples: Workers are usually paid extra for working overtime .

definitions.definition: The rate of pay, usually higher, for work done outside of or in addition to regular hours.
An extra period of play when a contest has a tie score at the end of regulation .
examples: That last-second shot ties the game 99-99 and sends it to overtime !

definitions.definition: A period of time longer than scheduled.

main_definition: ( uncountable ) Working time outside of one's regular hours.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) The rate of pay, usually higher, for work done outside of or in addition to regular hours.
( sports , countable , US ) An extra period of play when a contest has a tie score at the end of regulation .
A period of time longer than scheduled.
